'''The Sacred Flame Imperishable''' is [[Traveler (Pyro)]]'s [[Level 6 Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* DMG dealt by flaming waves is ''not'' considered Normal or Charged Attack DMG.
* Using a Charged Attack will fire 2 waves.
